Summary: to the east, 3rd night in a row
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around July 22nd 2012
divs: sighting detailsstarted the 7\20\12, was outside could sleep. it was about 3:40am seen a blinking red light heading east. didn't think much about it, then a white light came from the the east stop and hovered. then that red light was to the right of it. then another white light came from the east, but it was lower, and brighter. it stop and hovered as well, they form the shape of a triangle. this is the 3rd night in a row 20,21,22 they stayed there from 3 :40am to sunrise. even when the suns coming up you can still see them. there gone by 7:00am. i would really like to know what these things are!! i did rec them but they just look like stars. there not stars, or aircraft, they made no sound.
